summary: After ruthless gangsters wrongfully accuse him of stealing from them, a retired criminal has 24 hours to creep back into his past life and retrieve a bag of coke before his fiancée is killed.
cast: Raymond Thiry|Kim van Kooten|Bas Keijzer|Renée Fokker|Edmond Classen|Katja Schuurman|Birgit Schuurman|Willie Wartaal|Kempi|Simon Armstrong|Ursul de Geer|Alex van Warmerdam|Marwan Kenzari|Robert de Hoog|Horace Cohen|Semmy Schilt|Joop Kasteel|Job Castelijn|Bert Hana|Rachella Kingswijk|Alex Parlar|Michel Sluysmans|Kevin Stayner|Barbara Hijmans
title: Black Out
